divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on the 210 fwy east bound and I looked towards JPL and right behind the mountain range where 2 peaks were there was a UFO the size of a football field. I could see it as clear as a bird. It was silver(daul) shaped like a football but larger. It hovered between two mountain peaks before taking off. Was not a blimp. It moved to fast for that. In back of the mountain range where JPL is there is something going on over there.
Summary: Looking towards JPL this UFO behind mountain range
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Pasadena
There were no other sightings in Pasadena on or around December 28th 2009
